description: Returns the list of IAM Identity Center identity store attributes that have been configured to work with attributes-based access control (ABAC) for the specified IAM Identity Center instance. This will not return attributes configured and sent by an external identity provider. For more information about ABAC, see Attribute-Based Access Control in the IAM Identity Center User Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance under which the operation will be executed.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the attribute configuration process.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Provides more details about the current status of the specified attribute.

nested_items.name: InstanceAccessControlAttributeConfiguration
nested_items.description: Gets the list of IAM Identity Center identity store attributes that have been added to your ABAC configuration.

nested_items.name: AccessControlAttributes
nested_items.description: Lists the attributes that are configured for ABAC in the specified IAM Identity Center instance.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute associated with your identities in your identity source. This is used to map a specified attribute in your identity source with an attribute in IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The identity source to use when mapping a specified attribute to IAM Identity Center.
